tags: None
review:
** ****** ****** ** *** **** ****** *** ********My mother who is 71 was quite confused about the prolapse repair or uterus removal and had consulted her after having met some renowned gynaecologists in Delhi . She had been suffering for more than 2 years 
Dr Kansal put us at ease , assessed my mother and advised on 
laprascopic Pectopexy .She and her team performed the corrective surgery to 100% of our satisfaction. I shall be grateful to her always for being there for us , understanding our anxiety and for the second lease of life to my mother !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Consulted Dr. Dinesh Kansal for my wife. Dr.Kansal is very experienced and highly qualified. She responded to all the queries and made my mind for surgery. She with Dr. Supriya Mahipal  and her team performed the corrective surgery 100% to our satisfaction. I feel grateful for being in the best hands.  I strongly recommend Dr. Dinesh Kansal for her astonishing and excellent work. Her co-ordinator Ms. Neha took care for her admission and after surgery very nicely.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doesn’t do proper examination, no proper explanation about my disease,I’ve got some questions to ask but the doctor is not ready to interact with the patient.. I gave rs 2000 for consultation fee..at least she should do proper physical examination for patient satisfaction.*** ***** * will never suggest anybody.

tags: None
review: *** ** *****  ** *** ** ** *** ** **** **** ****** ** ***** *** ** **** ******* *** our experience with her was so bad first think she is very arrogant and rood she done surgery of my wife *** *** **** ******* ****** *** she was claiming we removed cyct and fiborids also flopian tubes **** ** **** ** ****** *** ** **** *** **** *** ****** **** **** **** ******* ****** *** *** ***** *** *** *** *** *** *** **** ** ****** *** ******* ******** i will never recommend this  doctor to anyone stay away from her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Dinesh Kansal had done astonishing and exceptional work! I was so afraid to get the dermoid cyst removed. But Dr. Dinesh Kansal is amiable, supported us morally, responded to all the queries and gave me hope and confidence to prepare my mind for surgery. She performed a successful laparoscopic ovarian cystectomy on me and removed the dermoid cyst without any complications and risks. Recovery is soon too. I feel grateful for being in the best hands. Trustworthy and highly recommended!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had a 10 cm fibroid in the uterus.  I consulted many docs everyone said it will be an open surgery. But it Dr Dinesh kansal  explained everything to me and she was the one who said that only fibroid can be removed through laparoscopy. She is an expert in her work, she performed my surgery which was successful and recovery was also very fast. Thank you mam. May God bless you for your future endeavours.

tags: None
review: ****** ******* *** competent doctor. My mother underwent hysterectomy under Dr Dinesh and despite my mother's age and other complications like diabetes, the results were excellent. Not just on the professional but on a human front, she put my mother at ease throughout the procedure and thereafter.  Thank you Dr Dinesh

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: When I first got to know about my Fibroid and underwent for the consultation to our family doctor, he suggested for Dr. Kansal. Because it was suggested that I anyway have to undergo surgery, went for second opinion to another gynae who too suggested Dr. Kansal do finally took appointment and went through the process.It's important for any patient to understand what is the real deal behind the issue they are facing. Explaining the whole medical condition in such a subtle manner and assurance she gives that it will be treated and cured is such a nice thing. The whole process was smooth.

tags: None
review: She's a very helpful doctor. **** ************* *** *******. She did my hysterectomy and helped me in every way possible for an easy recovery. I would recommend her for all kinds of surgeries, given the achievements and knowledge she's had.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I do not recommend this Doctor to anyone. She do not want to listen patient problem very harsh in behavior ****** ********* *********** ****** never attends calls even not in emergency, asks for expensive tests and recommend to do tests from her own facility which are more expensive than market price.
